teachers.name: Rachael Alice
teachers.specialties: English and Hebrew Teacher with Teachers' Credential, teaching online since 2009! KIDS ADULTS

aboutMe.location:
From United States
Living in Jerusalem, Israel
aboutMe.introduce: Hello everyone! My name is Jack, I'm 28 years old and I'm from England, UK. If you're interested in learning with a native English speaker with experience teaching both online and face-to-face, then I'm the teacher for you. Outside of the classroom, I love playing sports and working out as I think they are both so important for your physical and mental wellbeing. My favourite sport to watch is football; the team that I support is Liverpool Football Club. I also love travelling so that I can learn about other cultures and meet people from all over the world. My goal is to travel the world so that I can say that I have been to every country!

meAsATeacher.description: I have an authentic British accent because I have spent my whole life growing up in England. I can help develop your understanding of how people in the UK communicate in real life situations. However, if you want to focus more on American-English, I can help you with that as-well!  También hablo español, por lo que si usted es hispanohablante, podría ayudarlo a traducir ciertas palabras y frases (aunque trato de usar el inglés tanto como sea posible para el beneficio de mis alumnos). No matter what your level is, I like to focus on conversational English because I believe this is the most effective way to learn a language.

lessonsAndTeachingStyle.script: I am a very open minded teacher and I use many different resources...

certificates: Teaching Licence - Ministry of Education Israel - 2007...
Teaching Credential - David Yellin School of Education - 2006...

teachingExperience.workPlace: Alon Regional Elementary School - Jerusalem, Israel
teachingExperience.jobDescription: I teach from basic the beginning...
I teach Clarinet from the beginning...
I teach flute, clarinet, saxophone...

education.schoolName: University of California at Los Angeles

education.degree: Other - English as a Foreign Language

workExperience.jobDescription: English teacher online...
I teach groups of adults...

workExperience.workPlace: Beit Chana High School - Jerusalem, Israel
workExperience.jobDescription: 11th grade class, Bagrut Preparation...

englishLessons.lessonsCount: A1 - C2 Language Essentials 1,150 lessons completed

englishLessons.nameLesson: Social Studies in English for School Age Kids 10-16
englishLessons.lessonsCount: B1 - C1 Language Essentials 3 lessons completed

reviews.comment: I feel incredibly fortunate to have Jack as my oral English teacher. His passion and expertise has made each class a joyful experience, creating an engaging and inclusive environment where I can express myself and practice English fearlessly. Within class, Jack provides valuable resources, recommend captivating materials, and share cultural insights that enrich our language skills and broaden our horizons. Their constructive feedback has tremendously improved my pronunciation, fluency, and overall communication skills, boosting my confidence in expressing myself in English.
Tutto benissimo...
Tutto benissimo...

teachers.name: Mourad
teachers.specialties: Experienced language tutor for kids and adults, specializing in conversation skills.

aboutMe.location:
From Canada
Living in Paris, France
aboutMe.introduce: Me as a Teacher I have a special need to help people who dream of visiting or relocating, doing business with, or meeting new friends from  English Speaking countries with no language or communication barriers.  Also, if your dream is to ACS the speaking part of the IELTS or be outstanding in your job interview....or you are simply passionate about the English language and desire fluency... I’ve got you.. No matter what category.. I will help you actualize your dreams.

meAsATeacher.description: I have an authentic British accent because I have spent my whole life growing up in England. I can help develop your understanding of how people in the UK communicate in real life situations. However, if you want to focus more on American-English, I can help you with that as-well!  También hablo español, por lo que si usted es hispanohablante, podría ayudarlo a traducir ciertas palabras y frases (aunque trato de usar el inglés tanto como sea posible para el beneficio de mis alumnos). No matter what your level is, I like to focus on conversational English because I believe this is the most effective way to learn a language.

lessonsAndTeachingStyle.script: I customize lessons based on students’ goals and use interactive tools.

certificates: TESOL Certificate - International Open Academy - 2015
Bachelor of Education - University of Toronto - 2013

teachingExperience.jobDescription: Taught beginners and intermediate students French conversation and grammar.
Conducted 1-on-1 English lessons via Zoom for various age groups.

education.major: Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages

workExperience.jobDescription: Developed curriculum and trained new English teachers.

workExperience.workPlace: Language Institute of Canada - Toronto, Canada
workExperience.jobDescription: Taught high school students ESL for academic purposes.
Created online English course content for international students.

reviews.comment: Daniel is very patient and always adapts to my needs.
Great lessons, highly interactive and enjoyable!
Thanks to Daniel, I passed my language exam!

Very kind teacher and always well-prepared. I improved my Spanish quickly.
Great structure and feedback during every lesson!

Living in Copenhagen, Denmark
aboutMe.introduce: Me as a Teacher I have a special need to help people who dream of visiting or relocating, doing business with, or meeting new friends from  English Speaking countries with no language or communication barriers. certificates: TEFL Certificate - Bridge Education Group - 2021

teachingExperience.jobDescription: Taught students from Europe and Asia in conversational and academic English/Swedish.

Helped with classroom instruction and student feedback.

workExperience.workPlace: Red Cross Language Support Program - Sweden
workExperience.jobDescription: Taught basic English to refugee communities.

reviews.comment: Emma is very clear and kind. Her materials are amazing!
I learned useful everyday English quickly. Highly recommend her lessons.
She made Swedish easy and fun to learn. Tack så mycket, Emma!

lessonsAndTeachingStyle.script: Each lesson includes speaking practice, vocabulary expansion, and cultural notes. I use fun and structured materials.

certificates: TESOL Certificate - University of British Columbia - 2020
TOPIK Level 6 - 2018

teachingExperience.jobDescription: Taught over 700 lessons to international students focusing on speaking and exam skills.
Led classroom and private sessions for TOEFL/IELTS candidates.

Created video content teaching Korean slang and English idioms.
Assisted students with academic writing and speaking.
Paired with exchange students to improve their spoken Korean and English.

reviews.comment: David's TOEFL sessions boosted my speaking score. He knows exactly what examiners want!
Very chill and smart teacher. His Korean-English switching is seamless!
He helped me prepare for my job interview in Canada. Super helpful and encouraging!
